doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Madawala Liyanage Kusumawathie Vs The Hon.Attorney General before Hon. B. Sasi Mahendran, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Madawala Liyanage Kusumawathie Vs The Hon.Attorney General
latest_doc_d.legistation: Section 54 (a) (d) and Section 54 (a) (b) of the Poisons, Opium and Dangerous Drugs Ordinance, No. 13 of 1984, as amended
